select e.thirdDeptId as deptId,d.`name` as deptName,count(*) as count,e.secondDeptId from `app_studyCheck` e left join app_dept d on e.`thirdDeptId`= d.`deptId` where e.level=3
and d.name like concat('%',#{likeName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(e.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{fromDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate},'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(e.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d')
group by e.thirdDeptId,d.`name`,e.secondDeptId order by count desc

select e.userId, e.currentDeptId, u.name as userName, count(*) as count from app_studyCheck e left join app_user u on e.userId = u.policeId where e.thirdDeptId = #{thirdDeptId}
and DATE_FORMAT(e.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{fromDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(#{toDate},'%Y-%m-%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(e.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d')
group by e.userId, u.name, e.currentDeptId order by count desc
